sentences.sContent: There is also the potential to develop telecommuting and other more flexible working practices.
sentences.sCn: 也有发展家庭远程办公及其他更灵活的工作方式的可能性。

words.tran: 电话会议；[通信] 远程会议

trans.tranCn: 远程联机,  远程办公
trans.tranOther: Telecommuting is working from home using equipment such as telephones, fax machines, and modems to contact people
